-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Paul Hightower [mailto:dph_of_rules@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 14, 2003 9:48 PM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] Maze question


How many people would be interested in a program that generates random
 maze scenario maps for Gladiator?

Or what would it take for such mazes to be acceptable?
